nodes.text: The Junior Palace Guard was a division of the Royal Naboo Security Forces based on the planet of Naboo. Not dissimilar to its parent division, the Palace Guard, the Junior Palace Guard recruits Naboo's youth into its ranks. One notable member was Gregar Typho who fought in the Battle of Naboo; Typho was able to show a great amount of courage and strength of purpose despite only being a teenager.
